alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 26 at 1:16PM MDT until May 27 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding of low lying areas caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Along the Colorado River upstream of Shadow Mountain Lake. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 108 PM MDT, River gauges report high flows on the Colorado River above Grand Lake and Shadow Mountain Lake. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... along the Colorado River north of Grand Lake and Shadow Mountain Lake.
info.instruction: Excessive runoff from snowmelt will cause flooding of low lying areas near the Colorado River above Grand Lake and Shadow Mountain Lake.
